item.title: Is anything open on New Year's Eve 2025? See which stores are operating.
item.description: Most major retailers and grocery stores will be open on New Year's Eve, although some will have reduced hours.

item.title: HHS freezes all child care payments to Minnesota after viral fraud allegations
item.description: The Department of Health and Human Services said Tuesday it has frozen federal child care funding for the state of Minnesota, citing viral fraud alleg...

item.title: Former Republican Sen. Jon Kyl of Arizona says he has dementia
item.description: Former Republican U.S. Sen. Jon Kyl of Arizona announced his withdrawal from public life following a dementia diagnosis.

item.title: Democratic win in Iowa special election denies GOP a Legislature supermajority
item.description: Democrat Renee Hardman was elected to the Iowa state Senate in a year-end special election, keeping Republicans from reclaiming two-thirds control of ...

item.title: 12/30: CBS Evening News
item.description: Dangerous cold and snow slam large swaths of U.S.; We asked people to reflect on 2025 and share their hopes for 2026
